words.source: H8085 (שׁמע), HC/Vqq3cp (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-3cp, sequential future). KJV 'And they shall hearken', ESV 'And they will listen', NASB 'They will pay heed'.
H6963 (קוֹל), HR/Ncmsc/Sp2ms (preposition-lamed/noun-common-ms-construct/suffix-2ms). KJV 'to thy voice', ESV 'to your voice', NASB 'to what you say'.
H935 (בוא), HC/Vqq2ms (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-2ms, sequential future). KJV 'and thou shalt come', ESV 'and you…shall go', NASB 'and you…will come'.
H859 (אַתָּה), HPp2ms (personal-pronoun-2ms). KJV 'thou', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'. Emphatic pronoun.
H2205 (זָקֵן), HC/Aampc (conjunctive/adjective-mp-construct). KJV 'and the elders of', ESV 'and the elders of', NASB 'with the elders of'.
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Israel'.
H413 (אֶל), HR (preposition). KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'.
H4428 (מֶלֶךְ), HNcmsc (noun-common-ms-construct). KJV 'the king of', ESV 'the king of', NASB 'the king of'.
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Egypt'.
H559 (אמר), HC/Vqq2mp (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-2mp, sequential future). KJV 'and ye shall say', ESV 'and you shall say', NASB 'and you will say'.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp3ms (preposition/suffix-3ms). KJV 'unto him', ESV 'to him', NASB 'to him'.
H3068 (יְהוָה), HNp (proper noun, the divine name). KJV 'The LORD', ESV 'The LORD', NASB 'The LORD'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'God of', ESV 'God of', NASB 'God of'.
H5680 (עִבְרִי), HTd/Ngmpa (article/gentilic-mp-absolute). KJV 'the Hebrews', ESV 'the Hebrews', NASB 'the Hebrews'.
H7136 (קרה), HVNp3ms (Niphal-perfect-3ms). KJV 'hath met with', ESV 'has met with', NASB 'has met with'. All agree.
H5921 (עַל), HR/Sp1cp (preposition/suffix-1cp). KJV 'us', ESV 'us', NASB 'us'.
H6258 (עַתָּה), HC/D (conjunctive/adverb). KJV 'and now', ESV 'and now', NASB 'so now'.
H3212 (הלך), HVqh1cp (Qal-cohortative-1cp). KJV 'let us go', ESV 'please let us go', NASB 'please let us go'.
H4994 (נָא), HTj (particle of entreaty). KJV 'we beseech thee', ESV 'please', NASB 'please'.
H1870 (דֶּרֶךְ), HNcbsc (noun-common-both-singular-construct). KJV 'journey', ESV 'journey', NASB 'journey'.
H7969 (שָׁלוֹשׁ), HAcmsc (adjective-cardinal-ms-construct). KJV 'three', ESV 'three', NASB 'three'. All agree.
H3117 (יוֹם), HNcmpa (noun-common-mp-absolute). KJV 'days'', ESV 'days'', NASB 'days''. All agree.
H4057 (מִדְבָּר), HRd/Ncmsa (preposition-beth-article/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV 'into the wilderness', ESV 'into the wilderness', NASB 'into the wilderness'.
H2076 (זבח), HC/Vqh1cp (conjunctive/Qal-cohortative-1cp). KJV 'that we may sacrifice', ESV 'that we may sacrifice', NASB 'that we may sacrifice'.
H3068 (יְהוָה), HR/Np (preposition-lamed/proper noun). KJV 'unto the LORD', ESV 'to the LORD', NASB 'to the LORD'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc/Sp1cp (noun-common-mp-construct/suffix-1cp). KJV 'our God', ESV 'our God', NASB 'our God'.
